participant_1.background:
My worst moment was when I had to be away from my children for a week for a work trip.
I enjoy wearing suits that make a statement.
we are getting married in a park.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.

participant_2.background:
I took a long road trip to see the best sunsets of my life.
i am a short order cook at a local diner.
i have a wife and two kids back in the states.
I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.
I get to wake up early and spend time with my little brother and sister before school.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing this fine evening?
Hey! I am doing well, thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am looking forward to my wedding in the park next month.
That sounds lovely! I hope you have a wonderful time. I just took a long road trip to see the best sunsets of my life.
That sounds like an amazing experience! Where did you go?
I drove from California to Montana and back. It was a long drive, but it was worth it.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I am glad you had a good time.
Thank you! What do you do for a living?
I am a short order cook at a local diner.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job. I have always enjoyed cooking.
It can be fun, but it can also be very challenging.
I imagine it can be. What is your favorite thing to cook?
I really enjoy cooking breakfast foods. I think they are the most delicious.
I agree! I love breakfast foods.
It is always nice to start the day with a delicious meal.
I agree! What is your favorite breakfast food?
I think my favorite breakfast food is pancakes. I love the way they taste and they are so easy to make.
Pancakes are delicious! I love them too. I like to add fruit and whipped cream to mine.
That sounds delicious! I like to add butter and syrup to mine
